verbs.description: The community [V: is] invited to attended the funeral service for Roy Hope ( age 8) , Lisa Josiane ( age 7 ) , Christopher Danny ( age 5 ) , Joshua John ( age 3 ) , and Trump Emmanuel Kamali ( age 18 months ) at Mt. Zion Baptist Church this Saturday .
